title: Can we have an update? Please, in regarding to the stuck clients etc
body: The games been at an almost unplayable state for 5 hours since your last update - are you able to tell us how things are going? Once someone's client is stuck, they're stuffed, not to mention some of the game modes are disabled, if you can even play lol. Things do happen, but it'd be awesome to get some updates.

replies.body: my clients been stuck all day and same with my friends, all they say is that they're aware of the issue. thats nice but can I pretty please know a time indication so I don't have to waste my night hanging around? :( even if its to just tell us that its going to take half a day or something. thx riot
